segments.text: I'm looking into a kitchen right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene is quite busy, though one person seems oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a sink on the right, and the faucet is fully on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is quickly filling the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh dear, it's actually overflowing already!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A continuous sheet of water is pouring over the front edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's streaming down the cabinet doors and onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle is rapidly forming and growing larger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could cause significant water damage if left unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how much water is accumulating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor will become incredibly slippery very soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
